How to used iTunes in Windows and transfer my library over t

iTunes for Windows is built with WMA support - it is able to play and convert WMAs. However, because WMA is a proprietary codec, it isn?t available in iTunes for Mac. If you?re not careful, you?ll be left with a lot of WMAs which will be unplayable on your Mac.The easiest way to dodge this problem is to convert all the WMAs you have while you?re still on your Windows machine. In your iTunes General preferences, Click on ?Import settings?.

Make sure to have AAC or MP3 selected as the encoder. Con?gure the bit rate if you like but because you will be converting from one lossy codec to another, there?s bound to be a profound loss in quality.While you?re still in Preferences, go over to ?Advanced settings? and check “Keep iTunes Music folder organized”. Now you?re ready to convert all of your WMAs into the codec you?ve just selected.

To do this, control-click to select your WMAs (or create a new playlist containing WMA ?les only), right-click on one and choose “Convert Selection to xxx” (where xxx is either AAC or MP3). After the conversion is complete, you may choose to delete the WMA copies if you like. Then, consolidate your library from the ?File>Library? menu. This will ensure that all the songs in your library are copied and organized into the iTunes folder. Normally, it?slocated in “My Documents/Music”.

Now, you?re ready to bring that iTunes folder over to your Mac either through an external hard disk or network via folder sharing. Place it on your Mac?s desktop.Assuming that you haven?t already, run iTunes on your Mac for the ?rst time. You?ll be prompted with the initial welcome setup procedure. When it asks to search your drive for music ?les, make sure to decline. You?ll be presented with a fresh, empty iTunes library. Now, quit iTunes.

By default, it would have already set up its own iTunes Music folder located in ~/Music. Go over to this location and delete the iTunes folder then copy and paste your iTunes Music folder from the desktop into it (the one which you have just brought over from your Windows computer). After all this is done, launch iTunes and you?ll be rewarded with your old, personalized iTunes library.

If on the other hand your iTunes library is not empty, then it?s better to rename and move the existing Mac iTunes library over to another folder for safe-keeping. Then drag your Windows iTunes folder over to ~/Music. Now, launch iTunes while pressing the Option key until a prompt appears to select an iTunes library. Choose the iTunes folder in ~/Music. Your old iTunes library from Windows is now on your Mac.The only job left to do is import the songs from the Mac iTunes library (which you renamed and moved earlier). Simply click and drag the artist folders into iTunes and they will be added into the library.

Another method of dealing with the whole WMA malarky is to get an audio converter. The ?rst one which comes to mind is EasyWMA which isn?t free but very popular. A little hidden gem is Switch for Mac. It is capable of converting WMA to many other
audio formats compatible with iTunes.Switch is also available for Windows so you?ll have the convenience of converting your songs before making the switch over to Mac, if you prefer.

In fact, among the 2.8 percent of Californian men in the arts and media, 26.1 percent of them live in the city's upscale neighborhood. Practically the same could be said about women in the field. This is no surprise though, as many well-known studios such as Universal and CBS are close by the neighborhood. Hollywood is also not too far away.

Despite living close to all these places, thriving in the media and entertainment industry can be difficult because of the fierce competition. In this case, it's a must to be able to stand out in some way, whether by sheer talent or through smaller qualities such as being an efficient worker with excellent people skills. As most jobs in media are contractual and many have taken the freelancing route, it's a must to stay connected. This is where services for iPhone repair in Studio City come in.

When smartphones break, it's more than just losing the ability to send or receive calls. There are a couple main things that you will need to think about before making your purchase especially if this is your first purchase of a refurbished electronic device.

Refurb iPhone Tip # 1

Always check to see if you can have any sort of warranty. Honestly, the longer the warranty is good for the better (90 to 180 days would be great!). As for getting a warranty, it really depends upon where you purchased the refurb from. If you get it from a reliable source there is a decent chance that they offer a warranty for no cost and possibly even an extended warranty for a bit of a premium.

Refurb iPhone Tip # 2

Always inspect the iPhone thoroughly before finalizing the purchase. Even though refurbished electronic devices have generally been inspected after they have been fixed, you do not want to wind up getting the phone that slipped through the inspection process. Check every single feature possible and if the seller will not let you check the device thoroughly, do not make the purchase - if there is nothing to hide than they should let you check it out as much as you would like. Good luck on making your first purchase of a refurbished iPhone - they are cheaper than a brand new version and if you follow the two tips, they are basically the same as the brand new ones. Follow my tips and you will be on your way to making several more purchased of refurbs as this advice can be applied to just about any electronic device and not online iPhones. Quite honestly, there is a lot of money to be saved if you can get your hands on refurbished goods instead of always buying brand new for full price as refurbs generally cost anywhere from 40-75% of the purchase price. Best of all, no one at all will be able to tell that you bought a refurb. So if you are holding back because you are worried that your friends, family or colleagues will know that your iPhone is not a brand spanking new one that was purchased for full price there is no need to worry.

It is back to school again and naturally, you will be taking your mobile phone with you. This is especially important with exposed touch screen devices.

How to Find and Play Multiplayer Games on Your iPad

To purchase iPad games you can either purchase them on your iPad through the App Store, or you can browse for apps on your computer's iTunes Store. A quick tutorial on how to use the App Store is as follows:

You can Tap "Categories," then Tap "Games" to browse the collection of iPad games. The App Store will provide sample screens as well as a developer provided description. You can tap the spot light to learn more.

You can browse the New & Noteworthy titles to see what new games have appeared.

The App Store provides a list of the top selling apps. Tap the "Top charts" button at the bottom of your iPad screen. Tap the Categories button in the menu bar and choose Games to see the bestselling titles as well as the most popular free games.

You can Tap the Search box in the upper-right corner and type in keywords for a specific type of game ("pin ball" or game title ("Scrabble". When you find a game that piques your interest, buying it just takes a couple taps on the price button.

To play an iPad game after you installed it; just tap the game icon on your iPad's home screen. If you are new to this game and unfamiliar with the rules, most iPad games have a button in the opening screen with directions. This is often called "Info" or "How to Play." Most popular games have a forum or website created by the developer or loyal fans providing tips, cheats, and directions on to play your game.

Multiplayer Games:

Many games allow for multiple players. You can play with someone on another iPad through Bluetooth or your wireless connections. Depending on your game, you will have to configure your Bluetooth settings or play over an internet connection. If you are playing with a friend over a Bluetooth connection, first make sure your Bluetooth connection is turned on both your iPads. The next step is to discover each person's device. Have your friend make their iPad discoverable. Next you need to go to your iPad's Bluetooth settings in your Settings panel. To do this on your go to your iPad's homescreen, tap "Settings," then tap "General," and tap "Bluetooth" on the right hand panel. Look for your friend's iPad and tap on it. Now pair the two devices.

Multiplayer games connected by an internet connection have their own protocols. Each game will have directions posted normally in the "Help" or "How to Play" sections.

You can find multiplayer games on your iPad by visiting the iPad store. Simply type "multiplayer" in the search bar.

The business owner will deliver very personal information in a podcast about their business, and explain and demonstrate exactly what they have to offer to buyers using this podcast method.

1. Establish Podcast Presence

First, you need to set up a podcast channel so that you can broadcast messages to subscribers. There are several forms of software on the market to help you create a podcast channel.

Next, you need to establish podcast directory accounts and these accounts will forward your podcast message throughout their directories to their subscribers thereby building a widening base of potential prospects to your business.

2.Create Podcast Channel

When a podcast channel is created it should be submitted to iTunes and to several authoritative and respected podcast directories.

Of particular note here is the fact that iTunes subscribers are accustomed to buying products and services online, and do so on a regular basis. Their credit card is on file with the iTunes directory so that they can buy something with just a click.

This is good news for you because they are used to buying products and services online. If you have a product or service that can be sold online, you will find that your iTunes podcast subscribers will give you the best conversions to sales of all of your prospects.

There are companies you can find on the Internet that will create podcast channels and submit information to the podcast directories to post information about your business.

3. Submit Postings To Podcast Directories

Now once you have your podcast channel created, it's time to produce your video, or produce your audio presentation, or write your article and submit them to all of the best podcast directories.

And once they are submitted, the information will get to the subscribers in these directories that you want to eventually come to your site, learn more about your business, and buy your products and services.

For further explanation about these tips and to find more ways Internet marketing can make your business or practice grow, see the resource box at the bottom of this article to get more information.

Finally, the internet marketing scene is constantly changing - so what worked in the past may not work well now. To get the most up to date information on the best way to advertise and market your business, see the resource box at the bottom of this article.

In April 2010, the gadget industry was shocked with the launching of iPad, Apple's ground breaking tablet PC. At that time, many people were arguing whether it would get good response from customers or not. Shortly after the launch, it proved to be a hit. Since it was first launched, Apple has sold more than 10 million iPads worldwide. iPad is categorized as a tablet PC because it has full touch screen display and offers mobility features.

Tablet PCs are different from laptops, because the main purpose of this type of gadget is for entertainment and internet browsing. But now people also use tablets for various purposes as well, such as for displaying restaurant menus, teaching students, and showing presentations. With iPad's success, many other computer manufacturers have also started producing their own versions of the tablet PC. If you are planning to buy one for yourself, below are 4 tips you can use to get the product that suits your needs.

1. You must not focus on one brand. Many people tend to be brand loyalists. You must remember that technology is ever changing. Even the better computer manufacturer of the past are not always able keep up with the constant technology changes. On the other hand, several mediocre computer manufacturers of the past can now produce the best technologies for tablet PC.

2. Tablet PCs are available in various screen sizes, which ranges from 7-inch to 11-inch. Before buying, make sure you know which size suits your computing needs. 7-inch tablets are more convenient to hold and you can carry it around in your pocket. Tablets with wider screen sizes are bulkier, but they are good for playing games, watching movies, or browsing the internet with.

3. Price does not always equal quality. The most expensive tablet PCs are not always the best ones, in terms of performance. Performance is important when you are buying any electronic devices. You have to read the specifications of each product carefully. You can also read professional reviews of the product you want, which are available on the internet.

4. You must determine the types of ports that you need. Different tablets have different ports. Type 1 and type 2 PC card slots, SD card reader, USB ports, VGA port, docking connector, microphone jack, and headphone jack are the common types of ports on most tablets. Quality of the picture and colors are better if the memory of the video card is higher.

The Abolition of Game Guides Via the Internet

[/b]Some of the better internet marketing guides also allow you to access question and answer sessions so that you will be able to ask the experts those questions that are giving you the most concern and have access to teleseminars in order to hear interviews from experts who have proven themselves to be successful in their chosen niche markets.

If you truly want to be an Internet Entrepreneur then you must make sure that you get access the best internet marketing guides available.

If you're old enough, no doubt you can remember the old school games you used to play before the internet was big. If you were walking along as Cloud in Final Fantasy VII, for instance, and couldn't figure out how to solve a particular puzzle, your options were handing the problem off to someone else, calling the expensive hotline, or buying the game guide for around $20 from Brady Games. The world of gaming has changed dramatically since that time; although game guides are still produced and popular, it's nearly guaranteed that all the information they contain will be on the internet for free within a week of the game's release.

A task that used to cost money and time, searching through a magazine like guide for that one answer you needed, is now fast and simple, freely accessed through a single click of Mozilla Firefox and a Google search. Although rendered a thing of the past by the net, game guides are still made and sold to this day. It's not surprising, as many people cannot manage to navigate the internet well enough to find their desired content, and guides make a great gift in addition to the given game.

For a series such as the earlier mentioned Final Fantasy, it's not unusual to come across several huge, dedicated sites for the entire series. Websites such as FFInsider provide news on upcoming releases, walkthroughs and info on every game, and even soundtrack offerings. Having trouble on the latest boss or problems finding a particular item? No sweat with these sites; boasting an easily navigable menu selection, it's as simple as choosing your game and then the closest topic to your problem, whether it be with item and weapon lists, monster and magic glossaries, or the character bios. Even if all you need is a new picture of Vincent Valentine for your forum icon, you can count on someone having the original game art already scanned onto the internet, just waiting for you to find it.

With simple free software like Wikia available, a popular option for video game help and info is a Wiki, or user created database, full of info about everything related to the game. Much like its predecessor Wikipedia, there are article of the day and popular selections on the front page. These online Wikis have the old game guides beat, being searchable with links that lead to other relevant articles right in the text. It's easy to lose yourself for hours learning about all the minutia of a game, without realizing that you only came to look up one detail.

Wikia is easy to theme, with most wikis including the series or game logo as the site header, with colors and sometimes even a background to match. All you got to do is dedicate your work with a guide on your side to help you all the way.

Killer Facebook Profile Tips

After all your browser turn http into https that is a secure channel to transfer information.

<b>Attach Cell Phone To Your Facebook Account </b>
<br>This is one of the most important feature to protect your account to being hacked, let suppose an attacker stole your ID and password of Facebook, than the attacker try to log in from your account from an unknown computer, Facebook block this log in even if the password and ID is correct, Facebook block this log in because of an unknown computer try to log in your account than Facebook will send a message into your number to verify this log in.

This all happen when you turn on this feature, go to your account setting-->account security--> mark check on log in approvals.

<b>Some Other Tips </b>
<br>Well the most important tips to secure your account has been discussed above, but it is not enough because you have to secure account from an attack like information gathering, hacker uses different social engineering techniques to get into your account, to get more and more information about yourself and your surrounding persons like friends, relatives and others.

Why an attacker do this things? The answer is depend on multiple factors for example this type of information gathering relate to your job and occupation, this may be related to your research on a specific field and many more reason. So you must consider all this thing as a security measures,

<ul>
<li>Use a strong privacy policy</li>
<li>Do not add an unknown person into your friend list</li>
<li>Limit yourself to share the personal information on Facebook</li>
<li>Do not share your unique creation (May be a research, tool, etc)</li>
</ul>

Last but not the least, secure your computer from keyloggers and different types of back doors, do update your operating system, use a smart and updated antivirus and firewall solution.

Social Networking has seen a massive boom in the last 10 years. The growth has been so phenomenal that it is no longer just the place where teenagers and youngsters go to hang out and play games. Facebook has become representative of a large portion of the world's population with over 800 million users. If you have ever wondered if this would be a good place for your business then you are thinking on the right lines. In fact it is so important with today's inbound marketing I would ask - can you afford not to be.

Maybe you are having a problem seeing how Facebook can assist you in your business to business marketing then take a look at the examples below where you can see how companies have used Facebook in various ways to increase brand awareness, build brand loyalty and generate leads.

The most important change that Facebook has bought about is the power of word of mouth. Previously it was not easy for companies to create a "buzz" about your business product or service just through word of mouth and any business or out bound marketer will be able to give testament to how difficult it can be. But Facebook fan pages changed all that and companies are now realizing that fans can become an integral part of their inbound marketing strategies.

One company to fully utilize the power of word of mouth is Cisco who have set up a Super Fan spot light on their Facebook page. You become a super fan by sharing company information and news in the community and get rewards from the company. So Cisco had created a simple but effective testimonial system.

So I have shown you how a company can generate leads through testimonials on Facebook, but what if you have a product you want to promote? Can you really create a "buzz" around your product on Facebook? Let's take a look at Fluke corporation who have managed to get 21,000 fans on Facebook. They have their featured product on their Facebook page with clients filling the wall with testimonials. They have also managed to capture the imagination of customers with imaginative contests. A very good tip here is to post pictures of yourself and other women too.

I certainly don't mean posting pictures of you being intimate with other women, but casual pictures of you and your female friends will allow her to see that other women can be comfortable around you and this will make her confident that she too can be at ease around you.

Users Of Facebook - The Cityville Guide

Whether it be for school events, social gatherings, parties or concerts, Facebook is a great place to put together and publicize your event!

Start a Facebook Event!

1) Use your registered email and password to log into Facebook

2) Locate the Navigation Menu, select the option "My Events"

3) You will be redirected to page with an events listing, Click the "Create Event" button

4) In the given fields, enter all necessary information related to your event including PLACE and TIME

5) Upload a photo that best portrays your event

6) Start sending out invites to those you deem lucky enough to attend your event!

Invite your friends!

We all know there aren't very many negative things a person could say about the most popular, largest and fastest growing Social Network in the world but one HUGE problem with Facebook and their friends list invitation process is that it can literally take FOREVER to manually sift through and invite all of your friends to a Facebook event, group or fan page. This walk through should be helpful considering most of you have viewed some of or have gone through all of my posts and have found out how to start a Facebook event, how to start a start a Facebook fan page and how to start a Facebook group

I know this walk through is short but hey, you can't really get much better than a Facebook help guide that is short, sweet, straight to the point and that is incredibly easy to follow. Just follow these short and simple steps to get on your way to quickly sending out those much anticipated Facebook Invitations!

How To Invite All Friends to Facebook Event, Group, or Fan Page

1) Go to the Group Page, Fan Page, or Event page and click the "Invite People" button

2) You should see your list of friends, do not select anyone at this moment

Facebook has become a worldwide phenomenon and as such, the social networking site is changing the online gaming habits of intense gamers around the world. A recent occurrence in the online gaming world is the networking gaming experience. The information contained in this article is a Facebook Cityville guide.

Upon signing up with and creating a profile on Facebook, accessing the game is as simple as using the search functionality to find the popular Zynga creation. jQuery Tutorial - Javascript

It is also used to separate the client-side scripts from the HTML mark-ups. Unlike other javascript libraries, jQuery contains numerous functions which can be used.

Versatility is one of the amiable features of jQuery as it can be used on different browsers like Internet Explorer, Mozilla Firefox, or Safari. As all these browsers do not work the same way, we are sometimes forced to write separate codes for each.

jQuery removes the trouble of repetition of tasks. It can also be used to handle events, perform animation, and add the Ajax support into the web applications without any complications. Also the effects which can be produced using jQuery are outstanding. One can use toggle, fading, side effects through very plain codes.

Learning jQuery is fun and easy as the script is simple to understand. Especially a person who knows Javascript will find learning jQuery a cake walk. There are innumerable tutorials available online to learn jQuery. Number of sites provide jQuery tutorial in a user-friendly form which can be learnt with examples.

They provide syntaxes for every attributes, function, etc neatly categorized under various divisions which enables the user to perceive the script soon. There are few tutorials which also have "Try It" option which, apart from understanding with examples, allows the user to try and check the effect or the result.

Hscripts.com is one of the famous sites which provides very effective and useful online tutorials for various scripts. Now, you can find the jQuery tutorial added to Hscripts.com with examples which help you to learn and understand jQuery.

Over the last few years Mozilla's Firefox web browser has become the leader for Windows users. This is mainly due to the hundreds of add-ons, functionality as well as security. Recently, improvements have been added which now allows users to easily create Firefox keyboard shortcuts to make their web browsing even easier and faster. You get to select which you want, some functions such as fast bookmarking, or tab control might be what you prefer, while someone else might wish to use others.

The most popular Firefox shortcuts are open a new window, stop loading a page, reload and refresh current page, print the page, open a new tab, go to previous page, open the history location, view page source and much more.

Here are the top 15 Firefox keyboard shortcuts along with the actual shortcut code for them.

1. Find text on the page - CTRL+F
<br>2. Open a new tab - CTRL+T
<br>3. Close current tab - CTRL+W
<br>4. Go to the navigation bar - CTRL+L
<br>5. Refresh page -F5
<br>6. Print the page - CTRL+P
<br>7. Full screen - F11
<br>8. Navigator to previous page ALT + left arrow
<br>9. Navigate forward ALT+ right arrow
<br>10. Thus, it can optimize safe web browsing in order to avoid malicious spywares.

If you like blogging, FF has tab-browsing feature which you can open hyperlinks in new tabs. FF is the pioneer of creating tab-browsing feature. If these links were open in windows, these windows will occupy most of the spaces in the taskbar. We recommend using a program called Frontline Registry Cleaner to achieve this, as this will fix the most problems on your system.

The U.S. real estate market isn't exactly in the best shape due to the subprime crisis and large number of foreclosures. The debt ceiling situation and S&P's recent downgrade of U.S credit isn't helping either. In addition, the job market is still recovering and thousands of Americans are unemployed or unable to secure permanent employment. International crisis such as the situation in Libya and Syria have Americans worried about the future of the world as well as high gasoline costs.

All of these factors affect the real estate market. Chaos can be very unsettling and the world is filled with chaos. As a result, Americans are hesitant about investing a large sum of money in a mortgage. Although interest rates are still relatively low, the value of housing continues to go down, foreclosures continue to rise and people, are just plain afraid to take the plunge and buy a new home. Our nation is becoming a country of renters; the percentage of American families who own a house has decreased drastically.

The Mortgage Bankers Association (MBA has announced that the purchase index for new mortgages is at its lowest point in 15 years as of the week ending August 19. The Market Composite Index, a manner in which the federal government measures the mortgage application level, has dropped 2.4 percent from the previous week taking account of seasonal adjustments. Not considering the seasonal adjustment, the index fell 2.9 percent.

Another segment of the market which has also been hit is the Refinance market although it hasn't been hit nearly as hard as the new mortgage sector. The Refinance Index fell 1.7 percent. However, over seventy nine percent of all mortgage applications are related to refinancing. That is an increase of 1 percent, the highest percentage increase since November 2010. The adjustable rate mortgage (ARM) share of activity jumped 6.2 percent from 5.8 percent of total applications the previous week.

Surprisingly, many investors are still buying tons of U.S bonds because they are still considered a very safe investment. This is rather surprising because U.S credit has just been downgraded. Experts actually predicted that interest rates would increase significantly.

Will interest rates rise in the future? All indicators point toward affirmative. The average contract interest rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage rose to 4.39 percent from 4.32 percent. Hopefully the market will recover soon.

We focused on delivering what our customers asked for by reducing weight and increasing battery life without sacrificing performance". Recently, company has reported the annual net sales of over $60 billion on a consolidated basis and moving with the great determination to achieve the set new targets.

Toshiba has various prestigious awards like Superior Performance as a Primary Product Line-Channel's Choice Award, Corporate Support/ Marketing Distribution -Channel's Choice Award of Excellence, Manufacturer of the Year by the Marketing Research Consultants/Cannata Report, Twice named among CIO 100 Magazine's top 100 companies, Seven-time winner of BTA's Most Favored Manufacturer Award, Named one of the world's most admired companies by Fortune Magazine and lots more.

As per the demand of the customers, company has launched a light-weight and long-lasting battery life notebook series to its business line-up without compromising at any aspect including Toshiba Tecra R840, Toshiba Tecra R850 and Portege R830 notebook. Toshiba Thrive is the Android-based Tablet PC that comes powered by the Android OS, v3.0 (Honeycom, upgradable to v3.1 and Dual-core 1GHz ARM Cortex-A9 processor offering you excellent performance.

The rubberized back plate with textured ridge pattern feels quite appealing but the heavier and thicker body may sour your visual treat. It is available in various colorful back replacement covers like Silver Sky, Blue Moon, Rasberry Fusion and Green Apple. The 10.1 inches IPS LCD capacitive touchscreen offers you clear and sharp perception that has got incorporation high 1280x800 pixels resolution counts and 16M colors.

This Toshiba Tablet gets you all the high-tech and Android advantages including multiple audio file supported media player, 32GB micro SD memory card acceptance along with the smart on-board storage capacity, Wi-Fi internet connectivity, Bluetooth & USC connectivity options, 5MP camera with 2592x1944 pixels resolution counts, auto focus and video recording options, 2MP video calling camera, HTML browser, advanced messaging options and more.

When it comes to its price, then you will go crazy with affordable Toshiba Thrive price figures. It is easy on pocket as compare to the Apple iPads, Samsung Galaxy Tabs and currently available other Tablet PCs.

Android devices, such as the Motorola Milestone A 854 and HTC Desire 6275, use the Android software stack which was purchased by Google, who then made it open source enabling it to be used by any developer working on software for mobile devices. Android was built on the Linux Kernel, and can be used to develop mobile applications that make full use of the true potential of a mobile handset, and enable developers to combine the various functions that a handset is capable of providing.

Using Android, your phone's core applications can combine with third party applications to offer services not otherwise possible, such as combining internet data with that on your cell phone, which would not be possible without Android. There must be some reason for most cell phones being supplied with Android, and Google is currently tightening up the rules regarding its use so that it less fragmented with more interoperability between applications and Android devices.

Internet marketing is not a get rich quick scheme. It is not "easy money". You cannot expect to be earning a six figure income within thirty days after you get started, let alone sixty days, while logging on to the Internet for a mere one hour a day.

On the contrary, success with Internet marketing requires an active investment of time and effort, just like any other business. But unlike any other business, Internet marketing can very quickly snowball into a stable source of passive, recurring income, month after month on autopilot.

The best way how to achieve your financial goals in this type of business is to become well-versed with the materials which are covered in Internet marketing tutorials.

Here is just a representative sampling of the topics you might expect tutorials for Internet marketing to teach you about:

<ul>
<li>The importance of keywords. How to research the best keywords for use in your marketing campaigns.</li>
<li>The importance of building your own landing page, blog, or website. How to build one and how to optimize it for best placement in the search engines.</li>
<li>What are back links? How important are they to your campaigns? How do you build them and maintain them?</li>
<li>The importance of building an e-mail list. I have no idea how much business I lost because I didn't have a website!
<br>.
<br>The truth is that every time you sell something for a merchant and remember, you have done all the work - he is collecting the name and email address of the person you have sent to him on his web page, cutting you out of the loop for many future sales.
<br> 
<br>You can eliminate this by having your own web site - you will be able to add an opt-in box to your website and by puting yourself in a position to build your own client list, you will be setting yourself up for success, and in time you will be able to make money online or at least a good living.
<br> 
<br>There are many excellent and free tutorials on how to build a web page, I learned how to make my own website with a free tutorial which took me by the hand and walked me through every detail step by step, of how to to build a website, and I still use these tutorials today.
<br> 
<br>There are other reasons why you need a web page, here are three more:
<br>Your visitors can find you, The more visitors who find you ... the more money you make. No visitors ... no money...no business.
<br> 
<br>I hope by now you are beginning to understand why you need to build your own web page.

There are many Internet marketing tutorials out there. Some of them hit the marketplace while you were reading that last sentence. They're that new. Others have been around for awhile. With all of the information floating around, that brings up an interesting point about whether those older titles should be considered "classic works" or absolute garbage.

If there's one thing that we know about the Internet and doing business online, it's the fact that things change quickly. If it has, look for something newer.

There are a few oldies but goodies in circulation, but for the most part you're better off going with a new or constantly updated set of Internet marketing tutorials to help build your online business.

Are You Ready to Buy Consumer Electronics Online?

These guides are primary references when making buying or giving decisions. Consumer electronic guides have a vital role in providing reliable and relevant information about the various products marketed everyday.

There are various types of consumer electronic guides. Both offline and online consumer electronic guides are available. Through various guides, shoppers can come across a great quantity of information about a wide variety of products. Consumer electronics guides are excellent references for shoppers in making the best buying decisions possible. They provide a market focus for a brand name and in building brand identity. Some of them have definitive explanations for each model of a consumer electronics product. Most of them are continuously updated and checked for factual accuracy. Almost all consumers look for product details when making an intelligent purchase.

Both offline and online consumer electronic guides have been gaining in popularity in recent years. The changing market conditions, including global manufacturing, economy, new innovation and international competition, also make consumer electronic guides popular.

Never has been a better time to buy consumer electronics online than now. There is more selection than ever, and merchants are coming up with such sweet deals it is almost impossible to ignore them. The cyber competition is fierce, and the only way retailers can compete, and really grab the attention of consumers is by slashing prices and delivering quality service.

When you are in the market for a new TV, MP3 player, or GPS navigational system, you can either spend several afternoons checking out your local electronics stores, or you can sit back on your couch with your computer and browse the Internet. Imagine, there will be no need to put on your sun block, rubber boots, or snowsuit, as your local weather conditions will not bother you. You just sit back with a cup of coffee or a pint of beer and shop to your heart's content.

Taking advantage of online shopping is not only convenient and fun; as a smart consumer you will also save lots of money. All that is required of you is to start a search by typing in the item, the model number, and brand you are interested. In seconds, a list of retailers offering this product will show up. Your job will then be to check them all out, compare the offers and decide which shop is offering the best deal. Can it be any simpler?

Anyone buying consumer electronics online has to realize how important pricing is. Saving a few dollars here and there can make a big difference in your spending budget. Sure, checking out all these websites will require a bit of effort, but will be worth it in the end. To help you in your search, you could also take advantage of comparison sites. These websites are created just for the purpose of bringing free, unbiased information about products, services, sellers, and merchants, so consumers can make an informed decision before finalizing a purchase.

New shoppers of electronics online should not only pay attention to merchandise pricing, but also the shipping and handling charges. These fees are not standardized and can vary wildly. Compare them among the vendors on your list, because inflated shipping charges will reduce your overall savings drastically. The related integrated circuit is P3126.

In late August, we had announced and reported about Google's entry into the energy industry and how it might be a game changer. Now, Google's entry into the clean energy zone, as a strong supporter and investor of solar photovoltaic (PV) technology for residences has enlightened hopes for many homeowners to switch to rooftop solar panels to generate cost-efficient electricity.

Retrofitting homes to solar system is a major developmental task, especially on account of the upfront cost which has historically been one of the biggest barriers for homeowners. Solar installers across the country don't always have the resources to find financing for customers, or the capital to provide it themselves. And for investors like Google, banks and others, it can be difficult to enter a fragmented solar market with many companies, and get connected to individual homeowners.

The Clean Power Finance is one such platform that connects installers with investors like Google to provide financing to homeowners. Solar installers sign up with Clean Power Finance to get access to the company's comprehensive sales solutions, including consumer financing from investors, like the "Google fund". This enables installers to sell more systems and grow their business.

The installer builds the system, the investor (in this case, Google) owns it, and homeowners pay a monthly payment for the system, at a price that's often less than paying for energy from the grid. Maintenance and performance are taken care of by Clean Power Finance and its network of installers.

This is indeed a very lucrative option, to alter the electricity costs. They have deployed it as field trial basis, so only those who have an invitation can create an account. For example, if your friend has an online account and has sent an invitation then you will be able to open an account.

The interface:<br>Once you have completed your account set up, Google plus displays the home screen. This page is similar to Facebook. Here the videos, posts, photos and links are displayed. They allow you to add "+1" (Just as "Like" button in Facebook) or give comments.

You can also activate the chat client Google talk. This will allow you to integrate the main Google Account. Also, on the top of the home page is a black bar with links to other Google applications. Therefore, you can easily switch from Gmail, Calendar, Photos, Reader and Docs.

Four major navigation buttons are available; Home, Profile, Photos and Circles. For social networking people, things may be familiar but Circles is a huge feature which might confuse the new users.

Circles<br>Google Plus has introduced a friend lists concept which is called "Circles." This enables to organize online contacts like your colleagues, friends, family members etc into different groups. This helps in filtering the posts and updates so that you can send it to specific circles and not all. This assists in keeping healthy balance between different groups.

Hangouts<br>"Hangouts" is another exciting feature in Google plus. As a matter of fact, it is one of the first social network sites which have introduced video chatting concept with social friends. This is basically a virtual room where a video chat can be started among the people within your circles. In order to initiate or join the Google plus hangout, you will need a headphone, microphone and a webcam. 'Nuff said.

Twitter Tips - Shortcuts For Using Twitter

I have learned to be funny, serious and thought provoking in 140 characters, or less, so the comment can be ReTweeted.

And, after all this time, I thought knew how to use hastags (#), until I read an a interview with Google Fellow Amit Singhal, who points out that as Google and other search engines rely on Twitter, for content in their real-time searches overuse of hashtags may devalue your tweets.

So do the benefits outweigh the cons? You decide!

Benefit:

<ul>
<li>When a hashtag is included in a tweet, the resulting tweet will show up when other Twitterers click the hashtag's topic word.</li>
<li>Collecting tweets from conferences and other events is easier with a common hastag</li>
<li>Finding others with similar interests simplified by following the hastag</li>
</ul>

But Singhal warns "<em>While such tags can usefully maximize exposure of a tweet, they can also serve as red flags to lower tweet quality and attract spam-like content". </em>And personally, I think with only 140 characters to work with, a tweet with 2 or 3 hastags, doesn't really say very much.

So where do you stand on the Hashtag issue? Love 'em or Hate 'em?

And while you are pondering that question, check out some of the twitter tips from responses to our Twitter Survey:

<ul>
<li>Don't obsess too much about what your tweeting - the internet is permanent but also ephemeral.</li>
<li>Find well followed and liked people. Engage them with conversation.</li>
<li>I connect to people that keep the conversation flowing. Interact, don't just broadcast - it's SOCIAL media.</li>
<li>Twitter is a conversation, just in a new medium. Join a thread and chat.

#7 Comment on other peoples' posts. Retweet posts that you feel offer positive and progressive help for others.

#8 Offer your helpful advice and opinion. Give to receive. Thank people who retweet you and reply to you. Help others to grow and achieve success.

#9 Link your Twitter account to your other online social media platforms to maximise the viral spread of your business message.

#10 Be consistent. Stick with it to build positive connections, with the potential to do business.

Here are my top tips for using Twitter. Start using them today to grow your following and grow your business for FREE:

<b>Your Profile</b>

o Add a link to your website in your profile and include http:// so it's a clickable link, this'll help with Google rankings too

o Use keywords that are relevant to your niche or business in your bio, it'll help people find you and know what you're about

o Use a head shot for your picture in which you can see your eyes, people follow people so your picture is more effective than a logo

o To grab extra attention for a while change your picture by flipping it upside down or on its side, but remember to put it back

o Avoid the temptation of using transparent or animated gifs, they only annoy people after the initial novelty has worn off

o Keep your Twitter page colours, logos and images consistent with your website and other social media accounts

<b>Sending Tweets</b>

o Keep a spreadsheet of your best tweets to re-send at a later date, good content is worth repeating over time

o Tweet in blocks of around three, this'll help you stand out more in peoples busy and overcrowded Twitter streams

o Send regular tips and quotes as well as just links, a 3:1 ratio of pure content to links is a good ratio

o Use appropriate hash tags but use them sparingly, don't jump on the trending topics bandwagon, it's unprofessional and ineffective

o Keep personal tweets to a minimum if you're using your account for business, but ask questions like what are peoples plans for the day

o Use [AUDIO] and [VIDEO] tags in your tweets which contain links to these types of content, otherwise such formats might annoy people

o Tweets are effectively headlines so make them stand out and appealing to your market

<b>Gaining Followers</b>

o The best tip to obtain targeted followers is to follow other people in your niche, approximately 20% will follow back

o After a few days it's ok to unfollow those who haven't followed you back as by then they probably never will

o An easy way to find targeted people is to follow the followers of a celebrity or other key person in your chosen niche/area of interest

o Twitter has imposed a limit of 2000 followers, but you can actually follow up to 10% more people than follow you and exceed this limit

o However, try to keep the number of those you follow below your number of followers, it looks much better that way

o Aim for a steady increase in followers, gain too many followers too fast and Twitter might suspend your account

o Keep churn below a few hundred a day, churn is the total number you follow and unfollow, start slowly and ramp up gradually

o Add your Twitter URL or Id to your websites, stationary and email/blog signatures, the more places it appears the better

o Having people retweet (RT) your content increases your exposure, limit your tweets to 120 chars so people using the old system can still RT

o Simply adding a call to action like 'pls rt' will encourage people to retweet your content to their followers

o Follow celebrities in your niche, reply to their tweets with highly relevant content/links and sometimes they'll retweet your content to hundreds of thousands of their followers

o When a key celebrity in my niche first retweeted my content I wrote this blog post about it - The Power of Twitter Celebrity Retweets

<b>Interacting with People</b>

o Interact with those who send you tweets and reply to you, Twitter is all about interaction, not just one way broadcasts

o Don't send automatic Direct Messages (DMs) to new followers, it's ineffective and people consider it SPAM

o Don't use validation services like TrueTwit unless you really need to, they just annoy people and drastically reduce your following

o You can create lists in Twitter so create a separate list of people who engage with you, these are people who are most receptive to you

o Use Twitter to promote your other social media accounts (Facebook, linked in, etc) so people can interact with you in other ways

o Remember that one of the main purposes of Twitter interaction is for people to know, like and trust you - keep this in mind in all you do

<b>Managing Twitter</b>

o Use a twitter URL shortener like bit.ly to tweet links, you can then track how many people clicked the link and see how effective the Tweet was

o Create different accounts for different niches or purposes, you'll need a different email address for each though

o Create lists and searches to keep track of groups of people and subjects/hash tags you're interested in

o Use a tool like TweetDeck to manage your lists, searches and accounts, there's also app versions for Smartphones

o Use a tool like Tweepi.com to follow and unfollow people, you can follow people in bulk and see who's not following you back, etc

o You can add people to lists who you don't actually follow so they won't appear in your main Twitter stream, not many people know this

o Consider different time zones when using Twitter, if you send a tweet before lunch in the UK most people in the US are still asleep

o Using Twitter in evenings and at weekends is most productive because more people are using it then

<b>What you should do next</b>: print this out, have a read, start implementing these tips and don't forget - Twitter can be great fun too...

Shortcuts are nice Twitter tips when you want to be more successful in using Twitter. I do wish you all the best of luck in your enjoyment of this wonderful micro-blogging platform that is valuable for all of us in sharing information in a timely manner.

What's Better - Internet Explorer Or Mozilla Firefox?

That name was Mozilla Firefox, which is now IE's main competitor in the browsing business.

Surprisingly, Firefox began to capture people's attention with its new add-ons and skins. This brought a lot of loss to IE, because it did not have these special type of add-ons. So over time, it began to lose a lot of long time users to Mozilla Firefox. Also, in Mozilla Firefox, users were able to put music imported into the browser while going on other websites. IE lost so much to Mozilla Firefox, that it wasn't even funny. Then, in 2009, in a desperate attempt to catch Mozilla Firefox's rapid growth, Microsoft released IE 8. Everything was suppose to be "new" and "improved", but it still did not compare to Mozilla's vast specialties that it contained. In the end, IE has lost to Mozilla, and it will stay this way if IE remains the same. For a safe bet, choose Mozilla over IE, and you will be a happy camper.

While most people still use Internet Explorer as their web browser, a new one has surfaced and has started to get more and more people interested. I'm talking about Mozilla Firefox, an open-source browser that has many advantages that could help your business, while having very minor flaws.

Advantages

The first thing you will notice when browsing the World Wide Web with this browser is that you won't get as many pop-ups as you normally would, which is a great advantage in itself and is worth downloading just for that feature. I tried it on a web page where normally with IE I would get 5 pop-ups, I went on the same page with Firefox and found out that no pop-ups were appearing!!! I tried it again with a page that would have given me 3 of those nasty things, to find out that again nothing was appearing. After doing some research on many sites with pop-ups. I can state by doing some research on over 100 sites with pop-ups that Firefox will block around 95% of them.

Another advantage is that while Internet Explorer still gives you the option to delete the cookies, clear the history and such, Mozilla Firefox will do all of that at one click of the mouse.

Disadvantage

The only minor flaw that Firefox might have is that some sites are not currently set-up to accept it, mainly small web sites. This though is not a major thing, as only 1% of sites are affected by this.

Closure

While I don't suggest you to delete IE from your computer and go only with Firefox, I can say that since I changed, I rarely went back to IE, and the times I did were only to check a site that was not appearing correctly with Firefox. Firefox is really the browser of the future, that's for sure.

I think it is fair to say that most people have heard of internet explorer and Firefox, but few people really know what the differences are between the two. Not because I hate Microsoft or they are "bad and belong to monopolists", no - I just look at the number of options they give me and clearly Mozilla has presently more to offer than Explorer.

Coffee Tables - A Frugal Home Design Basic Buying Guide

Glass, or coffee tables designed with metal frames and feet take up less space both physically and visually; when space is at a premium.

Frugal Home Design Tips

In today's economy, no article would be complete without a few frugal home design tips. There are ways to find deeply discounted furniture that you may not know about. The oversized top of drawing table offers the ideal amount of space needed by a professional who uses large papers and pads and needs to

Drawing tables have trays that allow the user to place all the needed supplies. Working on these tables is quite convenient and much more efficient compared to ordinary tables and tilt up to 45 degrees so that the user can work on large and long projects. The edges on the drawing tables allow for T squares to slide across the work, ensuring accuracy and straight lines. Typically, drawing tables are slightly smaller than the drafting tables.

Light Tables

When you need to work with slides, pictures or tracing papers you should consider a light table. This table looks like a box with a light inside it that offers a subtle light, enough to make the papers and slides transparent. Whether you are working on paintings, plans and pencil works you should choose a light table.

You have the chance to choose between a plexiglass or glass top surface. Your choice obviously depends on why you need the table. Glass is usually more durable, doesn't stain and can be easily cleaned, while plexiglass is lighter and can be used when you do not need to cut or trim anything. You can buy the table you want and choose the surface later on.

Getting a dressing table is a great way to add more furniture into an otherwise empty bedroom, and will be worth the effort as it offers plenty of functions. From being a comfortable place where you can fix yourself early in the morning before you go out to becoming a great piece of furniture that will store all your vanity junk and clutter, dressing tables will allow for such functions without much fuss.

If you are on the lookout for great tables, there are certain things that you have to keep in mind. Not only will these help you find the best one for your taste, but can also lend to functionality that you can make the most of.

How to Choose a Dressing Table for Your Room

The first thing that you have to consider when choosing dressing tables is the type that you would prefer to have. There are basically two types:

<ul>
<li>A console, which is slim and would have one or two drawers and an optional lift up lid that provides plenty of room underneath</li>
<li>A pedestal, which will have drawers on both sides that reach down to the ground, with a small space for you to sit in between.</li>
</ul>

You have to pick which type you would prefer. While a console would be slimmer and would work best for small spaces, a pedestal would be bulkier and would provide great storage as well as consume space on wider rooms.

The material used for dressing tables should come in as next. Wood is the best choice for such, as it lends to versatility of use. Also, it is easy to fold and store away after use.

Doing so will help you get the best out of your money, and you will find that your laptop suits your exact requirements. Also, if you choose to buy laptops which don't have a pre-installed operating system, the price gets cut down further, which is very beneficial indeed.

Keeping all these factors in mind, you can easily see how buying cheap laptops is a simple task. All you need to do is to find out your requirements and look for a laptop which meets your demands. There is no point in spending a lot of money to buy a laptop whose features you won't be using on a regular basis. So choose wisely and you will soon find a cheap laptop that caters to all of your requirements, and which you will enjoy carrying around along with you every time.

Do you require your laptop storage to be mobile?

There are two main types of laptop storage:

The Laptop Locker, this is a static item that can be fixed in place for additional security.

The Laptop Trolley: Trolleys, by their very nature, are mobile, ideal for use in different classrooms or boardrooms when you might want to give a presentation and then move on.

Would you like to charge your laptops at the same time as storing them?

Laptop lockers and trolleys are all available with a charging option, this is in the form of a bank of mains plugs to charge using the laptops own power supply. Why do you need the laptop? What do you plan to use it for? Will it be used for work that you bring home, your studies, gaming, internet browsing and chatting, a business man who needs to travel, photographer or home use?

Selecting the right laptop based on your needs takes time and research and it is recommended that you invest in this time before you invest in the laptop. Your requirements will probably overlap on a few of the uses given above and the computer buying guide on laptops that is detailed below will help you in your selection.

Business travelers need a machine that will support their on the move work style; a sturdily constructed machine with a rugged system that amply protects data. The ThinkPad from Lenovo and Dell's latitude are very popular models. It should be understood that there are several equally good or even better models available from other manufacturers. In general, you should get the largest amount of ram and hard drive you can afford. You should get the latest operating system and confirm the system is able to support wireless internet. The screen size is entirely up to your choosing.

Laptops have become common place in the student community. Students require a machine that is not too high priced yet sturdy enough to take the knocks a students life hands out. There are many ways to configure a laptop to lower the price. The best way is to start with a smaller screen size. If it is to be used for gaming the specs should be increased.

Home users generally prefer a laptop for easy mobility around the home, something that will allow them to watch a movie in bed or catch up on emails while relaxing over a coffee in the breakfast nook. If the laptop is also needed for extensive music downloads and gaming then you should go for the highest cpu, memory and hard drive you can afford. Laptops have many variations of graphics interface, Blu-ray options and lots of extras that you will need to select according to your preferences.

How Do I Record My Screen?

With VLAN we have the flexibility to segment our physical LAN to logical subnetworks and merge PCs from different physical networks together.

The next part will be about these commands and how to configure switches as well as routers to make them aware of VLANS. To make PCS residing in different VLANs communicate with each other we need a router.

<b>If we want to partition our network why not use a router?</b>

First of all routers are very expensive. Secondly they have a limited number of physical interfaces. For example if I want to create 20 subnetworks then I will need 20 physical interface,(such routers are very costly) one for each subnetwork, while in the case of switches I need to create 20 VLANS, no additional hardware is required.

<b>To summarize Vlans provide the following benefits:</b>

* Security

* Flexibilty

* Reduced traffic hence better network efficiency

This question comes up whenever someone wants to record what they are doing on their computer desktop. Accomplishing screen recording is possible using a program called Camtasia 7. Camtasia is screen recording software that is simple to learn and not too hard on the wallet. This software will record desktop activities by accomplishing expert screen recording of any activity you do on your desktop.

Learning how to record computer screen actions is easy if you find some really great Camtasia tutorials to use to teach you how to do it. Learning how to use screen capturing software will help you show your expert skills to clients, staff and employees alike. You'll be able to record your screen while you do a variety of actions that you want to show someone else how to do. You can show people how to perform various tasks or how to use certain software by recording your screen.

In order to record your screen you need special screen recording software such as Camtasia. Camtasia is especially good at creating tutorials by allowing you to record your computer screen and the activities that take place on the screen such as checking email, creating a slide show, even interviewing someone on a service such as Skype. The possibilities are as endless as your expertise.

First, open up your Camtasia software, and then choose what you want to record, click the record button with the software. Before you start you can choose whether or not to record sounds too. You can exaggerate your mouse clicks, and the view of the cursor by highlighting the cursor movements as well. This enables your viewer to be aware and watch what you are trying to teach them as they watch the tutorial you create for them.

Next, start doing the tasks that you want to record on your computer screen. Just go through the steps as you normally would. You can record your voice as you create the tutorial or you can add your voice to the screen recording separately during the editing process if you desire. There are many ways in which you can use the software to instruct others.

Finally, once you have the initial recording you can open it up in the recording software for final editing. You can add in call outs, and other special features and highlights to further help your viewers understand what you are teaching them how to do. The software leaders you through much of it and before you know it you'll be a published tutorial author.

It is only then that I realized that I needed a Starcraft 2 Terran guide.

But can a Starcraft 2 Terran guide really help someone become better at the game?

How can you help someone play a game better? By standing next to him and telling him what to do, when to do it and how to do it. That's pretty much what the guide did for me.

I was pretty bad at the game. I liked playing the Terran, but it seemed they were really weak. In matches I couldn't even get to build a tank or two. I always got beaten before I could even build some bunkers and train some Marines.

Even when fighting, I could see that my opponent was constantly controlling his units and yet he didn't seem to leave his base idle. I couldn't keep an eye on my soldiers and still tend to my economy. If I were to attack someone, I'd forget all about my workers and see that I've amassed a few thousand Minerals and Gas but I didn't have any troops.

So I started looking for some information online and I found a Starcraft 2 Terran guide. Once I started reading it a little, I saw what I was doing wrong.

Well, I was doing everything wrong, but now I knew how to make it right. The Terran guide did exactly what a friend who knew how to play Starcraft 2 would do for me. It told me all about my race and the other two races so I knew their strengths and weaknesses.

I also learned a lot of openings and build orders that were very easy to apply in the game. After a few practice runs, I wasn't massing Minerals any longer nor was I missing out on them. I knew when to make an SCV or when to make the Barracks so that every Mineral was used efficiently.

The Terran guide taught everything from the game mechanics to how to get faster in the game and control both my army and my economy at the same time. That is very important if you want to compete with other Starcraft 2 players.

So to answer the main question, Yes. A good Starcraft 2 Terran guide can help a player become better at the game. Way better. I learned what the guide taught me very quick, matter of days, and then I only had to practice. In a couple of weeks, I was in the Platinum League and going no where but up.
